about_the_game:
A pack of various items to start your adventure off on the right foot.

　● Adventuring Aid Set

　　- Abiding Love

　　- Chalice Star+

　　- Ascetic's Arcanum

　● Elixir Set

　　- Strength Elixir

　　- Break Elixir

　　- Defense Elixir

　　- Vitality Elixir

　　- Luck Elixir

　● Arcanum Set

　　- Ascetic's Arcanum x2

　● Crystal Shard Set

　　- Crystal Shard x30000

　● Ailment Recovery Set

　　- Super Stimulant x10

　　- Super Sedative x10

　　- Super Antidote x10

　　- Super Relaxant x10

　　- Panacea III x10

　● Basic Material Set

　　- Basic Craft Stock x300

　　- Basic Reagents x300

　　- Basic Beast Parts x300

　　- Basic Ingredients x300

　● Rare Material Set A

　　- Celadon Clay x20

　　- Aged Wood x20

　　- Shell Rock x20

　　- Supple Leather x20

　　- Xiphoid Bone x20

　　- Tough Leather x20

　● Mana Material Set I

　　- Red Drop x30

　　- Blue Drop x30

　　- Yellow Drop x30

　　- Dark Drop x30

　　- Rainbow Drop x15

　● Fishing Bait Set

　　- Fishing Bait x20

　　- Fishing Bait S x20

　　- Fishing Bait M x20

　　- Fishing Bait L x20

　　- Fishing Bait EX x20

　● Running Start Set X

　　- Breath Water

　　- Warrior Seal+

　　- Hermit's Remedy

　　- 5000 Gold

　　- Crystal Shard x1500

　● Lv. I Mana Seed Set

　　- Sword Seal+ x2

　　- Axe Seal+ x2

　　- Shield Seal+ x2

　　- Armor Seal+ x2

　　- Chalice Seal+ x2

　　- Lyre Seal+ x2

　　- Fleeting Hope+ x2

*These items can also be obtained through standard gameplay.

*Items can be obtained by selecting the purchased content in the "DLC" tab of your Inventory, accessed via the Main Menu ingame.

*Please note that any items exceeding the maximum carrying capacity will be lost when claimed.
